name: Tied to the Tracks
description:
Solve puzzles to escape the runaway train before time runs out!

All aboard! Set on a mysterious runaway train, you have 10 minutes to solve the puzzles and make your escape. Can you stay on track, or will you reach the end of the line?

This project was created by Level 3 Games Development students in 2021. Solve a range of puzzles and beat the timer to escape from the runaway train!

Credit: Connor Minns, Edwin Neaves, Isaac Braithwaite, Ryan Higginbottom, Zain Dan-Bereh.
